name: HelpingGods
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: helping gods
des:
The skill's purpose is to create the world's first environment where kids can interact with legendary and mythological characters from all around the world. The kids join these characters in various fun adventures and also learn important life lessons like speaking the truth, eating fruits and so on.

The skill is opened by saying, "Alexa open helping gods". 
After this, the kid can select which character to have fun with!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
